data.name: Maze Ablaze
data.detailed_description:
Maze Ablaze is a fast-paced strategy game where you move the walls of a maze to defend an explosive barrel from an oncoming flame! Move fast and think faster as you work with limited resources to survive as long as possible.

This deceptively challenging game is all about optimizing your moves and thinking ahead of time. The mechanics are simple, but the strategies are anything but simple.

Explore 40 levels across 3 worlds in a layout that allows you to go at your own pace. You may want to steadily knock out level after level, or become obsessed with achieving perfection on a single level.

data.short_description: Maze Ablaze is a fast-paced strategy game where you move the walls of a maze to defend an explosive barrel from an oncoming flame! Move fast and think faster as you work with limited resources to survive as long as possible.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
